class_notes: Instructor strongly encourages students to take one of these courses - POLS 100, 101, 110, 111, or 120 - before taking this course.
course_description: Examination of individual liberties guaranteed by the United States Constitution, including freedom of expression and religion; the right to privacy; and the right against age, sex, race, or economic discrimination.
prerequisites: POLS 100 or POLS_OX 100, or POLS_OX 101, or POLS 110, or POLS_OX 110, or POLS 111, or POLS_OX 111, or POLS 120, or POLS_OX 120, or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3930, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: MW 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: S. Shomade, Status: Open
